attributes.action: leslie skelhorn   and the people of britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: an article in the mail online cited jack straw and tony blair as being traitors to britain i,d like to site a petition to the pm., to see what the government are going to do about it

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
